death.attack.sky_high: %1$s died because he wasn't high enough!
gamerule.alwaysSpawnDragonEgg.descriptio: Defines if the Dragon Egg always spawns when the Ender Dragon is killed
gamerule.canCopperOxide.description: Defines if normal copper can oxidize
gamerule.canEntityInteractWithEntities: Can entity interact with other entities
gamerule.canHurtPetMobs: Can player hurt his pet mobs
gamerule.canHurtPetMobs.description: Defines if a player can hurt his own pets
gamerule.canPlayerSleep.description: Defines if players can enter bed
gamerule.canPlayerTakeDamage.description: Defines if player can take any type of damage
gamerule.doCoralNeedWater.description: Defines if coral dies without water
gamerule.doIceForm.description: Defines if ice can form in cold biomes
gamerule.doIceMelt.description: Defines if ice can melt in normal and hot biomes
gamerule.doSnowForm.description: Defines if snow can form in cold biomes
gamerule.doSnowMelt.description: Defines if snow can melt in normal and hot biomes
gamerule.doTransformations.description: Defines if entities can transform (Zombies to Drowned, Villages to Witches, ...)
gamerule.explosionDamage.description: Set to -1 to use vanilla values
gamerule.keepEffects.description: Keeps only player's effects after death
gamerule.keepInventory.description: Keeps only player's inventory after death
gamerule.keepXp.description: Keeps only player's experience after death
gamerule.poisonHealth.description: Number of life points let by poison effect
gamerule.pvp.description: Defines if two players can hurt each other
gamerule.rawMeatHunger.description: Defines the percentage of chance your have to get hunger effect if you eat raw meat
gamerule.skyHigh.description: Defines the minimal high the player has to be before taking damages
gamerule.villagerConversion.description: Defines the percentage of chance a Villager has to turn into a Zombie Villager
message.not_enough_gamerules.sky_high_wa: WARNING: You're not high enough! You will take damages every 10 seconds.
